questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: How long does my video need to be?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: We ask that you keep the videos between 1-2 minutes.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: What type of video should I submit?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: This is your choice. Have fun and be creative.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: Who should apply?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A: High school seniors who will graduate by July 2016 and any college student who will still be in school thru July 2016.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Q: How much is the scholarship?
